<h3 id="X12667">X(12667)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: OUTER-GARCIA TO EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^7-(b+c)*a^6-(b^2-10*b*c+c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^4-(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^3+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12667) = 3*X(153)-2*X(12762) = 5*X(631)-4*X(5450) = X(944)-3*X(5658) = 2*X(1158)-3*X(5657) = 5*X(1698)-4*X(6705) = 3*X(5587)-2*X(6245) = 3*X(5587)-X(10864) = 3*X(5603)-4*X(12608) = 3*X(5657)-X(12246) = 3*X(5658)-2*X(6261)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(40).</p>
<p>X(12667) lies on these lines: {1,4}, {2,12114}, {3,1603}, {7,7686}, {8,6001}, {10,84}, {12,6847}, {20,100}, {30,10306}, {36,6927}, {40,2123}, {46,2096}, {56,6848}, {65,12678}, {72,12677}, {80,10305}, {104,6834}, {119,6891}, {149,12761}, {354,5804}, {355,971}, {376,6796}, {377,9799}, {443,5587}, {498,6935}, {499,6969}, {517,6259}, {519,7971}, {631,5251}, {938,12675}, {958,6908}, {960,5811}, {962,3885}, {993,6988}, {1012,3085}, {1125,6939}, {1158,5657}, {1329,6926}, {1385,6893}, {1466,7354}, {1498,9370}, {1512,1788}, {1532,3086}, {1538,11373}, {1698,6705}, {1709,10039}, {1737,10085}, {1837,5768}, {2478,5731}, {2800,5904}, {2975,6838}, {3057,12679}, {3146,5842}, {3149,4293}, {3189,5534}, {3333,7682}, {3419,12777}, {3529,5537}, {3576,5084}, {3577,3671}, {3616,6957}, {3679,7992}, {3822,6855}, {4297,6700}, {5080,6836}, {5082,5881}, {5086,9960}, {5090,12136}, {5176,9961}, {5218,6906}, {5223,11362}, {5234,6684}, {5252,12688}, {5253,6953}, {5261,7680}, {5274,10893}, {5552,6909}, {5660,6903}, {5687,12330}, {5688,6257}, {5689,6258}, {5787,6826}, {5790,12684}, {5794,12664}, {5818,6897}, {6831,10590}, {6833,10588}, {6844,10895}, {6845,10599}, {6851,10526}, {6864,9843}, {6888,10585}, {6890,11681}, {6928,10742}, {6930,10267}, {6932,10527}, {6938,11491}, {6941,10589}, {6942,12248}, {6944,10269}, {6948,11499}, {6956,7951}, {7373,7956}, {7501,8185}, {7966,12575}, {8193,9910}, {8197,12456}, {8204,12457}, {8727,9654}, {9857,12496}, {10431,11015}, {10791,12196}, {10902,11111}, {10914,12676}, {10915,12686}, {10916,12687}, {11900,12668}</p>
<p>
X(12667) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,6260), (4,6256), (20,11500), (84,10), (149,12761), (944,6261), (3189,5534), (6851,10526), (10864,6245), (12246,1158), (12650,946), (12680,9942)<br>
X(12667) = anticomplement of X(12114)<br>
X(12667) = X(84)-of-outer-Garcia-triangle<br>
X(12667) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4,944,497), (4,1056,946), (4,7967,10531), (4,10805,5603), (4,12115,388), (4,12116,5225), (20,153,3436), (20,7080,10310), (104,6834,7288), (355,6850,2550), (944,5658,6261), (1478,5691,4), (1478,10572,10629), (1837,12680,5768), (5587,10864,6245), (5657,12246,1158), (6906,10786,5218), (6941,10785,10589), (10572,10629,497)<br>
</p>
